generating insertion site randomly
```{r}
library(BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg19)
library(tidyverse)
genome <- BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg19
#keepStandardChromosomes(genome, pruning.mode = "coarse")
seqlengths(genome) %>% as.data.frame()
```

```{r}
rr  = data.frame(chr=sample(seqlevels(genome)[1:24], 50, replace=T))
rr$start = apply(rr, 1, function(x) { 
         round(runif(1, 0, seqlengths(genome)[x][[1]]), 0) }
         )
rr$end = rr$start + runif(1, 1, 5000)  # random intervals of 1-1000 bases
rr$strand = sample(c("+", "-"))

rr.gr = makeGRangesFromDataFrame(rr)

seqlevelsStyle(rr.gr) <- "NCBI"
write_csv(as.data.frame(rr.gr), path = "simsv_region.csv")
```
